nodes.description: Ahmed Osman Saleh stepped off a minibus in Tirana and caught his last glimpse of daylight for three days.
nodes.support_text: Ahmed Osman Saleh stepped off a minibus here in the Albanian capital in July 1998 and caught what would be his last glimpse of daylight for three days.

nodes.description: Albanian security agents slipped a white cloth bag over Mr. Saleh's head, bound his limbs with plastic shackles and tossed him into the rear of a hatchback vehicle.
nodes.support_text: As he paid the driver, Albanian security agents slipped a white cloth bag over Mr. Saleh's head, bound his limbs with plastic shackles and tossed him into the rear of a hatchback vehicle.

nodes.description: U.S. Central Intelligence Agency agents supervised the operation from a nearby car.
nodes.support_text: Supervising the operation from a nearby car were agents from the U.S. Central Intelligence Agency.

nodes.description: Mr. Saleh's Albanian captors sped over rutted roads to an abandoned location.
